name: tHrIVE_MIND
description:
Plot the direction of your roots to survive .. and thrive .. in the wilderness.

Left mouse button to pick up and place tiles.

Right mouse button to rotate a tile.

Middle mouse button to pan and zoom.

A game made for the Singapore Global Game Jam 2023

By LAmbrose, Ivo, CMacarthur, and Gouellie.

Music by airtone
